extension_description.message: Create and manage custom tabs in the available space on Salesforce Lightning Setup page.

theme_light.description: [popup] title on the sun to switch theme

theme_dark.description: [popup] title on the moon to switch theme

delete_all.description: [popup] title on the bin to empty all Tabs

table_org.description: [popup] assistive text for column with org checkbox

table_delete.description: [popup] assistive text for column with delete button

table_row_label.message: Enter the label for this URL

table_row_url.message: Enter the sub_URL where you want to be redirected.

table_row_org.message: Click if you want this tab to be available for this Org only.
table_row_org.description: [popup] checkbox to toggle Tab to be org-specific

table_row_org_name.message: The Org for which this Tab is available.
